channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Recteq Flagship 1600 Review: An Upgraded Smoker
item.description: The Recteq Flagship 1600 pellet smoker asks a little more of you, but rewards you with deeply smoked flavor.

item.title: Avec ce TV 55 pouces signé TCL, le QLED est à découvrir pour moins de 350 €
item.description: Carrefour propose une offre très intéressante pour ce TCL QLED de 55 pouces qui possède une connectique complète et une interface intuitive. Sur le site de l'enseigne, il est à 349,99 euros.

item.title: MWC 2026 live updates: Announcements from Honor, Xiaomi, more
item.description: All the biggest news from Mobile World Congress 2026 in Barcelona.

item.title: Video Doorbell Advice and Settings for Opting Out of the Surveillance State
item.description: Video doorbells are handy, but they’re a threat to privacy. I spoke to experts about why you might ditch your doorbell, and how to safeguard your video.

item.title: There's a sneaky way to watch Marshals for free
item.description: Here's our guide on a super simple way to stream Marshals for free from anywhere in the world. This Yellowstone spinoff is a Kayce Dutton-fronted procedural.

item.title: I tested Kodak's cheap and pocketable film camera, and it's packed with retro-futuristic charm
item.description: A few clever touches and striking styling elevate Kodak's cheap 35mm film camera above the level of a disposable point-and-shoot – but the ongoing costs can be steep.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for March 1, 2026
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1716 on March 1 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.

item.title: NYT Mini crossword answers, hints for March 1, 2026

item.title: Save $455 on the modern HP Omen 16 with a shiny new Intel Core Ultra 7 and an RTX 5060
item.description: A big saving and great price for a modern gaming laptop

item.title: Best Laser Printers I've Tried (2026): Brother, HP, and More
item.description: Looking for fast printing at a relatively affordable cost? You probably want a laser printer.

item.title: La nouvelle batterie Xiaomi est tellement pensée pour l’iPhone qu’elle en adopte les couleurs
item.description: Xiaomi vient de lancer l'accessoire parfait pour votre iPhone 17. Le problème ? Xiaomi ne vend toujours pas de smartphones compatibles avec les aimants Qi2. En lançant cette batterie de 6 mm, la marque chinoise ne s'en cache plus : elle veut s'installer dans vos poches, même si vous refusez de quitter iOS.

item.title: Xiaomis new hyper car concept has the strangest cockpit weve ever seen
item.description: Xiaomi has unveiled a new hyper car concept called the Xiaomi Vision GT. It's something else.

item.title: Honor has a humanoid robot, and its bringing it to Mobile World Congress
item.description: Honor is bringing a humanoid robot to Mobile World Congress 2026.

item.title: Hands on: Xiaomi Pad 8 Pro is the closest you can get to an iPad Pro on Android
item.description: Xiaomi Pad 8 Pro is a dead ringer for Apple's iPad Pro, and that includes the accessories.

item.title: Xiaomi 17 launches alongside Xiaomi Tag, Watch 5, and more
item.description: Xiaomi has brought a lot of gadgets to Barcelona. See the latest ones now.

item.title: MWC 2026: What to expect at the worlds largest phone show
item.description: Mobile World Congress 2026 is almost upon us. Here's what we can expect from the world's largest phone show.

item.title: From Quantum Spam to Quantum Minds: Why the ‘Best’ Revolution in Physics Is Only Getting Started
item.description: Physicist Paul Davies looks back at the past century of quantum mechanics—the most disruptive theory in the history of modern science.

item.title: Make the Most of Chrome's Toolbar by Customizing It to Your Liking
item.description: There are plenty of ways to customize Chrome to make it easier to navigate the web, manage your tasks, and make your workflow more efficient.

item.title: How to watch Man Utd vs Crystal Palace: Live Streams & TV Channels
item.description: All the ways to watch Man Utd vs Crystal Palace live streams online and from anywhere, with hosts looking to continue their impressive run under Michael Carrick.

item.title: I've found 9 stylish and sturdy cases that will protect your shiny new Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra
item.description: And, they're available in other colors apart from blue, just so you know

item.title: These 15 housing markets have the most borrowers underwater
item.description: In total, 2.1% of outstanding U.S. homeowner mortgages are underwater—up from 1.3% a year ago. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked, affaire VLC et smartphone modulaire – Les actus tech qu’il ne fallait pas rater
item.description: Voici le petit récapitulatif des actualités tech marquantes de la semaine. Au programme : les annonces Samsung, le créateur de VLC en colère et le smartphone modulaire de Tecno.
